content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: glowstone
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 4, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 25, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 22}, {"type": "player_head", "quantity": 46, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 36, "index": 28}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}, {"type": "barrier", "quantity": 62, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a glowstone, I need to place 4 glowstone_dust in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. Since there are 4 glowstone_dust in slot 15, I will move 1 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glowstone
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 25, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 22}, {"type": "player_head", "quantity": 46, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 36, "index": 28}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}, {"type": "barrier", "quantity": 62, "index": 42}]
thought: I have placed 1 glowstone_dust in slot 1, and now need to place another in slot 2 to complete the first row of the 2x2 square.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glowstone
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 25, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 22}, {"type": "player_head", "quantity": 46, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 36, "index": 28}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}, {"type": "barrier", "quantity": 62, "index": 42}]

thought: I have placed 2 glowstone_dust in the first row of the 2x2 square, and now need to place another in the second row. Since slot 4 is below slot 1, I will move 1 glowstone_dust from slot 15 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glowstone
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 25, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 22}, {"type": "player_head", "quantity": 46, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 36, "index": 28}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}, {"type": "barrier", "quantity": 62, "index": 42}]
thought: I have placed 3 glowstone_dust in the 2x2 square, and now need to place the last one. Since slot 5 is to the right of slot 4, I will move the last glowstone_dust from slot 15 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glowstone
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 25, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 22}, {"type": "player_head", "quantity": 46, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 36, "index": 28}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 19, "index": 40}, {"type": "barrier", "quantity": 62, "index": 42}]
thought: I have placed all 4 glowstone_dust in the 2x2 square, and now need to move the resulting glowstone from the crafting slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
